name: BINKY Gaiden X1-2: Switsch
description:
The Gaiden in the award winning series!

What is a gaiden? Is it a spinoff? Is it not "cannon"? What is "cannon" anyway, something pirate ships use?

BINKY... nantendo... what evils await?

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move
